item.title: [Delta] Fix addItem method [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Well I realized that the addItem command only adds 1 item if it is not stackable, this does get a bit annoying sometimes and I see some people just calling the method numerous amounts of times to make it spawn for example 4 bronze scimitars. This fix isnâ€™t the greatest code but it works well.

Re-name your addItem void to like getItem because or else you would have to change every single time the addItem method is being called to a different name.

Add this in your client class:

public boolean addItem(int item, int amount) { int getAmount = amount > 28 ? 28 : amount; if(!Item.itemStackable[item]) { for(int i = 0; i < getAmount; i++) { getItem(item, 1); } } else { getItem(item, amount); } return true; }
